title: Easy Chicken a la King
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 green pepper, chopped', '100g sliced fresh mushrooms', '225ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '325g cooked, cubed chicken breast meat', '250ml soured cream', '2 egg yolks', '1 jarred roasted red pepper, chopped', '4 teaspoons sherry', 'salt and pepper to taste']
